system: Twitter / X posting via bird CLI
failure_mode: Tweet replies with accumulated @mentions are shadow-deleted — visible to poster, invisible to everyone else
symptoms: tweet not visible in mentions of tagged users

approaches_killed.approach: thread replies with @mentions accumulated from previous tweets
approaches_killed.died_because: 90%+ shadow-delete rate — anti-automation rule 226 triggers on reply chains with multiple @mentions
rate is not the trigger — @mention accumulation pattern is
content length is not the trigger

solution: Post standalone tweets only. Never thread with accumulated @mentions. Pull contacts off-platform before threading. Each tweet should read as independent, not as a reply chain.
notes: Rule 226 anti-automation. GraphQL endpoint is what kills it — rest API may differ. Effective cost per visible reply in threaded @mention chains is ~$0.10 (10x stated). Farcaster has no equivalent restriction.
